HeroSection.title: Secure, private cloud storage
HeroSection.subtitle: that protects your right to privacy
HeroSection.description: Internxt’s open-source, web3 cloud storage protects your privacy with zero-knowledge post-quantum encryption.
HeroSection.info: Claim your exclusive {{discount}}% discount on all Internxt annual and lifetime plans!

MostSecureSection.title: The most secure cloud storage for your files, photos, and more
MostSecureSection.description: Internxt Drive is an open-source, end-to-end encrypted cloud storage solution to store, back up, and share your files in total privacy. Internxt Drive offers award-winning encryption and control over your data.

ScrollableSection.title: Secure cloud storage with unmatched privacy
ScrollableSection.description: What makes Internxt so special? We’re a tight-knit team of professionals completely dedicated to protecting you online. Everything we do and every decision we make is centered on protecting your data from being exploited.

elements.title: Unmatched privacy
elements.description: Protecting your privacy is our top priority; we never store passwords or personal data. Your files are encrypted in transit and at rest, giving you complete control over your information.

elements.title: Next-generation security
elements.description: Internxt is the only cloud storage that automatically encrypts your files using end-to-end and post-quantum cryptography, meaning only you can access your data.

elements.title: Open source and transparent
elements.description: Our source code is made public on GitHub and can be personally reviewed, audited, and verified by anyone. We have nothing to hide but your data.

elements.title: Independently verified
elements.description: We adhere to stringent GDPR regulations and maintain a 100% secure environment. To ensure our claims, Internxt has undergone an independent audit by Securitum, a trusted penetration testing leader in Europe.

planTitles.homePage: Choose the right plan for you

PaymentSection.lifetimeDescription: With a one-time payment, you can get a lifetime of privacy. You'll have access to all of Internxt’s privacy-focused features and encrypted cloud storage forever.
PaymentSection.planDescription: All Internxt plans come with complete access to our privacy-focused features. Subscribe to Internxt and secure a year of encrypted cloud storage.

freePlanCard.description: Get up to 1GB of encrypted cloud storage and enjoy our private ecosystem: VPN (FR), CLI/WebDav/Rclone, and much more.

CtaSection1.title: The world's most private cloud storage
CtaSection1.description: Claim your exclusive 82% discount to access Internxt's secure, private, and encrypted cloud storage for an entire year.
